Title: Recompense
Description:
We heard the echo of the explosion from here.

I presume you have found victory, but your solitary arrival suggests not all is well.

What happened?
ObjectivesText: Speak to Adelgonn to inform Merrix of Baelgrim's fate.
RewardText:
May we all learn from Baelgrim's valor.

He died to preserve our people--our unity. We must not let that be in vain.
